The Spanish tragedie containing the lamentable end of Don Horatio, and Bel-imperia: with the pittifull death of olde Hieronimo. Kyd, Thomas, 1558-1594.
Newly corrected amended of such grosse faults as passed in the first impression.
[84] p.
Printed by Edward Allde, for Edward White, At London : [1592]
By Thomas Kyd. Has perpendicular chainlines. Signatures: A-K⁴ L² . Reproduction of the original in the British Library. Publication date conjectured by STC.
=======
